inputParams.label: Get Relative Links Method
inputParams.name: relativeLinksMethod
inputParams.description: Select a method to retrieve relative links

options.label: Web Crawl
options.name: webCrawl
options.description: Crawl relative links from HTML URL

options.label: Scrape XML Sitemap
options.name: scrapeXMLSitemap
options.description: Scrape relative links from XML sitemap URL

inputParams.label: Get Relative Links Limit
inputParams.name: limit
inputParams.description: Only used when "Get Relative Links Method" is selected. Set 0 to retrieve all relative links, default limit is 10.
inputParams.warning: Retrieving all links might take long time, and all links will be upserted again if the flow's state changed (eg: different URL, chunk size, etc)

inputParams.label: Selector (CSS)
inputParams.name: selector
inputParams.description: Specify a CSS selector to select the content to be extracted

inputParams.label: Additional Metadata
inputParams.name: metadata
inputParams.description: Additional metadata to be added to the extracted documents

inputParams.label: Omit Metadata Keys
inputParams.name: omitMetadataKeys
inputParams.description: Each document loader comes with a default set of metadata keys that are extracted from the document. You can use this field to omit some of the default metadata keys. The value should be a list of keys, seperated by comma. Use * to omit all metadata keys execept the ones you specify in the Additional Metadata field

data.label: OpenAI Embeddings
data.name: openAIEmbeddings
data.description: OpenAI API to generate embeddings for a given text

outputAnchors.name: openAIEmbeddings
outputAnchors.label: OpenAIEmbeddings
outputAnchors.description: OpenAI API to generate embeddings for a given text

data.label: Recursive Character Text Splitter
data.name: recursiveCharacterTextSplitter
data.description:
Split documents recursively by different characters - starting with "

", then "
", then " "

inputParams.label: Chunk Size
inputParams.name: chunkSize
inputParams.description: Number of characters in each chunk. Default is 1000.

inputParams.label: Chunk Overlap
inputParams.name: chunkOverlap
inputParams.description: Number of characters to overlap between chunks. Default is 200.

inputParams.label: Custom Separators
inputParams.name: separators
inputParams.description: Array of custom separators to determine when to split the text, will override the default separators

outputAnchors.name: recursiveCharacterTextSplitter
outputAnchors.label: RecursiveCharacterTextSplitter
outputAnchors.description:
Split documents recursively by different characters - starting with "

", then "
", then " "

data.label: Pinecone
data.name: pinecone
data.description: Upsert embedded data and perform similarity or mmr search using Pinecone, a leading fully managed hosted vector database

inputParams.label: Pinecone Text Key
inputParams.name: pineconeTextKey
inputParams.description: The key in the metadata for storing text. Default to `text`

inputParams.label: Top K
inputParams.name: topK
inputParams.description: Number of top results to fetch. Default to 4

inputParams.label: Fetch K (for MMR Search)
inputParams.name: fetchK
inputParams.description: Number of initial documents to fetch for MMR reranking. Default to 20. Used only when the search type is MMR

inputParams.label: Lambda (for MMR Search)
inputParams.name: lambda
inputParams.description: Number between 0 and 1 that determines the degree of diversity among the results, where 0 corresponds to maximum diversity and 1 to minimum diversity. Used only when the search type is MMR

inputAnchors.label: Record Manager
inputAnchors.name: recordManager
inputAnchors.description: Keep track of the record to prevent duplication

data.label: Conversational Retrieval QA Chain
data.name: conversationalRetrievalQAChain
data.description: Document QA - built on RetrievalQAChain to provide a chat history component

inputParams.label: Rephrase Prompt
inputParams.name: rephrasePrompt
inputParams.description: Using previous chat history, rephrase question into a standalone question
inputParams.warning: Prompt must include input variables: {chat_history} and {question}

inputParams.label: Response Prompt
inputParams.name: responsePrompt
inputParams.description: Taking the rephrased question, search for answer from the provided context
inputParams.default:
I want you to act as a document that I am having a conversation with. Your name is "AI Assistant". Using the provided context, answer the user's question to the best of your ability using the resources provided.
If there is nothing in the context relevant to the question at hand, just say "Hmm, I'm not sure" and stop after that. Refuse to answer any question not about the info. Never break character.
------------
{context}
------------
REMEMBER: If there is no relevant information within the context, just say "Hmm, I'm not sure". Don't try to make up an answer. Never break character.

inputAnchors.label: Memory
inputAnchors.name: memory
inputAnchors.description: If left empty, a default BufferMemory will be used

inputAnchors.label: Input Moderation
inputAnchors.description: Detect text that could generate harmful output and prevent it from being sent to the language model
inputAnchors.name: inputModeration

inputs.responsePrompt:
I want you to act as an AI assistant that I am having a conversation with. Your name is "AI Assistant". Using the provided context, answer the user's question to the best of your ability using the resources provided

If there is nothing in the context relevant to the question try to answer the question with your own and if you are not able to answer question just say " I don't know" or anything like that. 
------------
{context}
------------

outputAnchors.name: conversationalRetrievalQAChain
outputAnchors.label: ConversationalRetrievalQAChain
outputAnchors.description: Document QA - built on RetrievalQAChain to provide a chat history component

inputs.name: data_retriever

data.label: Buffer Window Memory
data.name: bufferWindowMemory
data.description: Uses a window of size k to surface the last k back-and-forth to use as memory

inputParams.label: Size
inputParams.name: k

inputParams.label: Session Id
inputParams.name: sessionId
inputParams.description: If not specified, a random id will be used. Learn more

outputAnchors.name: bufferWindowMemory
outputAnchors.label: BufferWindowMemory
outputAnchors.description: Uses a window of size k to surface the last k back-and-forth to use as memory

data.label: ChatOpenAI
data.name: chatOpenAI
data.description: Wrapper around OpenAI large language models that use the Chat endpoint

inputParams.label: Allow Image Uploads
inputParams.name: allowImageUploads
inputParams.description: Automatically uses gpt-4-vision-preview when image is being uploaded from chat. Only works with LLMChain, Conversation Chain, ReAct Agent, and Conversational Agent

inputParams.label: Image Resolution
inputParams.description: This parameter controls the resolution in which the model views the image.
inputParams.name: imageResolution

outputAnchors.name: chatOpenAI
outputAnchors.label: ChatOpenAI
outputAnchors.description: Wrapper around OpenAI large language models that use the Chat endpoint
